title: AI-Enabled Digital Immersion Language Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and intermediate-level understanding of the target language
context.additional_context: Enhancing real-life language application skills for working professionals

learning_goals: Achieve the ability to engage in daily conversations in the target language for 10+ minutes using generative AI (LMM).
Acquire 50+ job-related terms through interaction with a digital agent.
Improve grammatical accuracy by 80% or more through an AI feedback system.

Learners can form a team of three peer learners in a blended environment (online collaboration tools + face-to-face meetings), collaboratively create a 10–15-minute presentation on a given project topic (e.g., global marketing strategy), and deliver a presentation achieving at least 70% in each evaluation criterion (content structure 30%, collaboration participation 30%, visual effects 40%) based on peer and instructor assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
